page.title: 12Arts and Crafts in Northill
page.content: Arts & Crafts are prominent when fairs and bazaars are held, & include{lace- {making, sewing, leatherwork, crochet, {knitting and soft toys. }A youth group makes articles which are sold in aid of the Church at Christmas. {Sheep {fleeces}are spun into wool and sold or made into garments by{local spinners who also demonstrate their skill. {Tapestry work, landscape painting}in oils and watercolours are all enjoyed as hobbies. Many ladies are competent {dressmakers,}whilst others form a rota to arrange the{Church flowers}weekly, combining their efforts for festivals & competitions. Excellent{photographs of the surrounding area & local people are produced to a very high standard & gain many prizes at local shows. More diverse crafts are studied at{evening {classes}run by the local Education Authority and held in nearby towns.
